<color=black>Ausdauer: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Schaden: </color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5 Sekunden</color>
<color=black>Besonderheit: </color><color=#8B0000>Verursacht dreimal mehr Schaden an Rüstungen.</color>

plants.name: Rugbypilz
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>„Ich habe immer davon geträumt, Rugbyspieler zu werden, und jetzt habe ich endlich diesen Hut der Ehre“, sagte Rugbypilz stolz. „Aber heute habe ich beschlossen, eine Pause an der Seitenlinie zu machen.“ In Wahrheit ist er nur ein Stadion-Sicherheitsmann, der die zu begeisterten Fans mit seinen Sporen fernhält.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Versprüht Dämpfe, die alle Arten von Rüstungen durchdringen!

<color=black>Ausdauer: </color><color=#8B0000>3000</color>
<color=black>Schaden: </color><color=#8B0000>80/1.5 Sekunden</color>
<color=black>Besonderheit: </color><color=#8B0000>Fügt der Rüstung und dem Zombie in der Rüstung gleichzeitig Schaden zu.</color>

plants.name: Titan Pea Turret
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>As one of the ultimate weapons of the Pea family, the Titan Pea Turret is always taught not to lie down without reason. "But my head is really heavy!" Sometimes, when being scolded, he complains like this. Of course, he doesn’t know that the Pea elders tell him not to lie down just because it's actually kind of cute when he does.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Unleashes pure pea hell onto zombies!

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>Initially 20×30/1.5 Seconds</color><color=#8B0000> Max 20×60/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Firing speed increases the longer the turret fires and has 3 stages. Firing speed returns to normal when its attack resets. Peas may miss Imps due to the turret's height.</color>

Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Repeater + Threepeater + Repeater + Jicamagic (Place Jicamagic on Threepeater)</color>

plants.name: Explod-o-tato Mine
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Explod-o-tato Mine is a top chef, and his "hash cherries" and "potato jam" are highly praised in the plant world. If he runs out of ingredients, he will cheerfully say: "I'll go buy some."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Splits into 8 Potato Mines in surrounding tiles.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns Potato Mines in a 3×3 radius upon defeat.</color>

plants.name: Chili Mine
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Chili Mine is a capable assistant to Explod-o-tato Mine, but most of her dishes are given low ratings by customers. "What’s going on—" Chili Mine feels really guilty but doesn't know why. The truth is, she is not sensitive to spicy flavors and always adds too much chili.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Splits into 7 Potato Mines in her lane. 

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns 7 Potato Mines in her lane upon defeat.</color>

plants.name: Pump-Kaboom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Pump-Kaboom is a distant relative of Cherry-nut, but every time Pump-Kaboom meets Cherry-nut, he is always late. "I want to come early too," Pump-Kaboom says, "but I can’t resist jumping to anything red."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A pumpkin that cannot be exploded by cherries!

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Cannot be damaged by zombie Cherry Bomb explosions and heals instead.</color>

plants.name: Snow Commando
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>As the general commander of the Pea family, Snow Commando has an aura that makes plants and zombies shudder even from miles away. But regarding his proud freezing ability, Super Ice Machine Gunner always keeps quiet about it, until one day a small pea accidentally opened his diary: "If I had known, I wouldn’t have bet against the fire sniper. Not only did I almost freeze to death in the ice fields, but I also turned into this way. Tonight, I’ll make that guy eat three big bowls of chili—"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots Snow Peas at zombies, with a small chance of shooting a massive barrage!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20×6/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black></color><color=#8B0000>Ultimate: 3×20/0.02 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>3% chance to shoot a barrage of snow peas each attack.</color>

plants.name: Volatile Magnet
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Selling well is also a skill." said the Volatile Magnet. Only Magnet-shrooms can turn hate into love. He once hated cherries the most. Actually, he still does, but perhaps he has discovered a business opportunity?</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Transmutes metal objects into explosive cherries!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Consumes metal objects and turns them into explosive cherries. Each metal object can be turned into 5 cherries. Metal objects can be actively given to the Volatile Magnet for it to initiate an attack.</color>

plants.name: Blazer Pea
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Other snipers envy Blazer Pea for being a reliable assistant to the commander, even though she is still a little one. "Talent is one thing, but... I have to thank the commander for cultivating me!~"Blazer Pea says, but in reality, it's because Snow Commando is naturally cold and always keeps Blazer Pea as a warm-up buddy.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can lock onto zombies anywhere on the map!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Attacks cause Enflamed and deal 100 damage to nearby zombies</color>

plants.name: Pea Commando
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Faced with the crazy zombies and powerful teammates, Pea Commando, who came to the yard for more challenges, feels immense pressure, and his temper is getting worse... However, the plants are always shocked by the extreme violent tendencies of the Pea Commando, who fires peas madly from a distance. Gatling Frenzy-shroom has already decided to ask for his contact information.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots Peas at zombies, with a small chance of shooting a massive barrage!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20×6/1.5 Seconds
</color><color=#8B0000>Ultimate: 3×20/0.02 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>3% chance to shoot a barrage of peas each attack.</color>

plants.name: Titan Pumpkin Bunker
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Once, a pair of pumpkins dreamed of joining a circus. But after a magnetic mishap left them stuck together, they discovered a better calling: standing their ground as an impenetrable shield. The circus can wait.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Protect two tiles at once!

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>12000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Heals when affected by Cherry and Jack-in-the-Box explosions. Can only be placed on two-tiled plants.</color>

Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Joker Pumpkin + Magnet-shroom + Pump-Kaboom + Jicamagic (Place Jicamagic on Magnet-shroom)</color>

plants.name: Nugget-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Some plants asked: "Why is the top of Nugget-shroom red?" Potato Sprout Mushroom then asked: "Well, let me ask you first..."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can reproduce itself!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns a new Nugget-shroom in the same tile after 20 Seconds. Each Nugget-shroom can only reproduce once. Upon death, it deals 300 damage to nearby zombies</color>

plants.name: Spuddy-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Why does Spuddy-shroom explode after a few attacks? His explanation is quite touching: "Every attack I make is burning my life!" But the truth is—he’s just a magician who doesn’t want to do much work. After a few attacks, he decides to use a potato firework to perform a grand "fungus" transformation.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Consumes HP to fire high-damage spores!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>600/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Each attack costs 75 HP. If kept alive for 20 seconds after being planted, his red light will turn off with attack power reduced by 90%, but attacks will no longer cost health. Upon death, it deals 600 damage to nearby zombies.</color>

plants.name: Foul-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>With a pale skin, a hairstyle that could rival a cathedral dome and a grin full of crooked teeth, Foul-shroom looks like it's auditioning for the villain in a fairytale. Ironically, he usually gets the role of a vampire.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Sprays poison gas at zombies!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Attack adds one Poison Point to zombies. It also has inherited garlic property.</color>

plants.name: Frostburnt Jalapeno
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cold on the outside, fiery on the inside. This is how other plants describe Frostburnt Jalapeno. "Don’t be fooled by my calm appearance, my explosive energy is beyond your imagination," murmurs Frostburnt Jalapeno. Oh, by the way, he's also quite skilled at making ice-cream.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Has both the properties of Ice-shroom and Jalapeno!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Loses 20% health every 3 seconds. While present, absorbs damage for all plants. Upon death, triggers Jalapeno in his row and fullscreen Ice-shroom.</color>

plants.name: Titan Chomper Maw
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Titan Chomper Maw won the grand prix in an Gourmet king contest, finishing 10 giga garg cakes in 44 seconds — with 3 of those seconds wasted because he didn’t hear the starting whistle. "If there’s another event like this, please call me. The buffet near the garden won’t let me in anymore," said the Titan Chomper Maw during the interview.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Swallows all zombies that get too close!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>Instakill</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Can swallow all zombies in a 1.5 space range (unless immune to Chompers, but including regular gargs), digestion time t=8+3xln(total HP of zombies) Seconds. 
For reference: Zombie - 24.8 Seconds, Buckethead - 29.9 Seconds, Giga Gargantuar - 34 Seconds, 10 Giga Gargantuars - 41 Seconds</color>

Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Chomper + Chomper + Chomper + Jicamagic (Place Jicamagic on the middle Chomper)</color>

plants.name: Hypnoblover
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Plants are always curious why Hypnoblover pulls the zombies back. Hypnoblover explains: "Since Blover always pushes zombies to the opposite direction they face, I believe it's only natural for me to do the same to hypnotized zombies."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can pull back hypnotized(charmed) zombies!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Pulls all charmed zombies back.</color>

plants.name: Twin Bladegrass
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Twin Bladegrass' two heads are constantly arguing — one swears spinning is the best approach, while the other insists launching saw blades is superior. Somehow, their teamwork still cuts through the competition.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Attacks nearby zombies with its blades and can also strike at a distance!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>The front head attacks like a regular Bladegrass, while the back head targets all zombies on the screen, firing homing and piercing blades every 1.5 seconds for 10 damage.</color>

plants.name: Boomwood
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Boomwood's Afro bounces rhythmically, as if dancing to a beat only it can hear. Some say his groove inspires his fiery creations, while others just appreciate the spectacle — both the style and the explosions leave a lasting impact.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spawns a seeker cherry drone after igniting a number of projectiles, and turns explosive cherries into drones directly.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>For every 30 peas it passes, it generates a seeking cherry drone. Also converts any explosive cherry that passes through into a cherry drone. There can be up to 3 cherry drones at once. Upon death, it triggers a Cherry Bomb explosion.</color>

plants.name: Bamboom
plants.introduce: <size=36>
plants.info:
<size=36>Propels himself towards the zombies, causing damage and knocking them back.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>After being planted, waits for 1 second before flying forward in his lane, knocking back zombies it encounters and causing 300 area damage each impact. Deals extra damage to Nian zombies.</color>

plants.name: Frostweed
plants.info:
<size=36>Frostweed can slow down zombies that walk on it.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1 Second</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each hit adds 10 Cryo Points.</color>

plants.name: Foul Blover
plants.introduce: <size=36>
plants.info:
<size=36>Foul Blover can poison zombies.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Inflicts 5 Poison Points to every zombie in the screen and apply the Poisoned Debuff. It also increases the time the debuff stays by 5 more seconds and force them to change lanes. </color>
